channel.title: Authors on Jerome Quenum | EECS at UC Berkeley
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Jerome Quenum | EECS at UC Berkeley

item.description:
Jerome Quenum is an Electrical Engineering Ph.D. student at UC Berkeley. His research interests include Signal Processing, Machine Learning, and Computer Vision. He is affiliated with the Berkeley Artificial Intelligence Research (BAIR) Lab and is advised by Prof. Zakhor.

Previously, Quenum attended the University of Maryland, College Park where he was awarded the University Medal. Throughout his journey, he has participated in various academic research programs and many outreach community volunteering initiatives. Currently, Quenum is serving as a Signal Officer in the U.S. Army.
